events.text: Abraham Lincoln is born
Ulysses S. Grant is born
William McKinley is born
Woodrow Wilson is born
Theodore Roosevelt is born
Franklin D. Roosevelt is born
The Football Association is founded in England
The first international football match is played
FIFA is founded
The first FIFA World Cup is held
Pelé wins his first World Cup with Brazil
The first FIFA Women’s World Cup is held
Megalosaurus is scientifically described
The term Dinosauria is coined
The first Tyrannosaurus rex skeleton is discovered
The first dinosaur eggs are discovered
The asteroid impact theory for dinosaur extinction is proposed
Jurassic Park is released
Jaws is released
Close Encounters of the Third Kind is released
Raiders of the Lost Ark is released
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial is released
Jurassic Park is released
Schindler’s List is released
Sputnik 1 is launched
Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human in space
Apollo 11 lands the first humans on the Moon
Voyager 1 is launched
The Hubble Space Telescope is launched
The James Webb Space Telescope is launched
IBM is founded
Sony is founded
Intel is founded
Microsoft is founded
Apple is founded
Google is founded
The modern Olympic Games begin (Athens)
Women first compete in the Olympic Games
The first Winter Olympic Games are held
The Olympic flag is first flown at the Games
The first televised Olympic Games are held
The first Youth Olympic Games are held
Alexander Fleming discovers penicillin
The first successful human kidney transplant is performed
The structure of DNA is described
The first human heart transplant is performed
The first test-tube baby is born
The Human Genome Project is completed
The Magna Carta is sealed
The Treaty of Westphalia is signed
The Treaty of Paris ends the American Revolutionary War
The Treaty of Versailles is signed
The United Nations is founded
The Good Friday Agreement is signed
The Atari 2600 is released
The Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) is released
The PlayStation is released
The Nintendo 64 is released
The Xbox is released
The Nintendo Switch is released
Mary Shelley publishes Frankenstein
Charles Dickens publishes A Christmas Carol
Lewis Carroll publishes Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland
Bram Stoker publishes Dracula
George Orwell publishes Nineteen Eighty-Four
Harper Lee publishes To Kill a Mockingbird
The first modern Nobel Prizes are awarded
The Academy Awards (Oscars) are first held
The FIFA Ballon d’Or (Ballon d’Or) is first awarded
The Grammy Awards are first held
The Booker Prize is first awarded
The Nobel Prize in Economic Sciences is first awarded
The Wright brothers achieve the first powered flight
Charles Lindbergh completes the first solo nonstop transatlantic flight
The first commercial jet airliner (de Havilland Comet) enters service
Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human in space
Concorde enters commercial service
The first powered flight on another planet (Ingenuity on Mars) occurs
Star Trek: The Original Series premieres
Star Trek: The Animated Series premieres
Star Trek: The Next Generation premieres
Star Trek: Deep Space Nine premieres
Star Trek: Voyager premieres
Star Trek: Enterprise premieres
Michael Faraday discovers electromagnetic induction
John Snow links cholera to contaminated water (Broad Street pump)
Gregor Mendel publishes his work on inheritance
Dmitri Mendeleev publishes the periodic table
Wilhelm Röntgen discovers X-rays
Marie and Pierre Curie discover polonium and radium
Superman: The Movie is released
Batman is released
X-Men is released
Spider-Man is released
Iron Man is released
Marvel’s The Avengers is released
ENIAC is unveiled
The transistor is invented
The integrated circuit is invented
ARPANET sends its first message
IBM launches the IBM PC
Apple releases the first iPhone
